name: Starship Clicker
description:
Starship Clicker is a clicker with a twist - it's a race against time!

Whoosh through the galaxy and shoot to earn Dust - spend Dust on upgrades to generate more Dust. Amass lots of Dust to advance through space, hopping from planet to planet. If you advance fast enough, who knows what'll happen?!

Thank you for visiting this page. This is my first finished game to be released on Steam. I'll do my best to address any issues - please let me know in the forums.Features
  • Clicking
  • Space
  • A spaceship
  • Neon lasers
  • Planets
  • Steam Achievements
